section4.paragraph-1: Arabic is spoken by more than 400 million people worldwide, and it is the official language in over 20 countries.

values.text: Learning Arabic allows access to a rich and diverse culture, linked to Islamic civilization, literature, art and music. Knowing the language gives you a deep understanding of these traditions and establishes an authentic connection with native speakers.

section7.paragraph: With teaching structured in six modules, with current contents ranging from basic to advanced.

items.title: Literacy
items.paragraph: At this level, the student will achieve autonomy in reading and writing Arabic, mastering all the letters, sounds and correct pronunciation of phonemes. You will develop solid skills to start your language journey with confidence

items.title: Basic level
items.paragraph: At the end of this level, the student will talk about various everyday topics and will communicate in a basic way in common situations, ensuring an enriching and authentic experience.

items.title: Pre-intermediate
items.paragraph: You will have skills for everyday conversations in Arabic, understanding song lyrics and movie clips. In addition, you will have a solid grammatical domain and a wide vocabulary to understand more complex contexts.

items.title: Intermediary
items.paragraph: Upon completion of this level, you will master advanced Arabic conversations, have a broad technical vocabulary, and be able to understand and sing complete songs.

items.title: post-intermediate
items.paragraph: You can speak fluently, effortlessly, and use Arabic professionally by writing complex texts. These skills will ensure you communicate effectively, confidently and competently in the language.

items.title: Advanced
items.paragraph: You will be very familiar with the Arabic language and will be able to use it naturally in many situations and occasions. You will feel complete confidence and fun when communicating fluently in the language.

title.part-1-normal: By joining my new class, you receive a

paragraph.text: You will have access to interactive lessons and practical exercises, which will reinforce the content learned in the classroom.
In addition, the app offers audio and pronunciation features, allowing you to practice listening and improve your pronunciation.
An excellent opportunity is offered to students, who have the unique advantage of enjoying complete and completely free access to our innovative music translation panel.
Egyptian Arabic students receive a 70% discount on the Standard Arabic course, while Standard Arabic students enjoy a 70% discount on the Egyptian Arabic course.

paragraphs.text: I have been an Arabic teacher for almost 10 years. I started my work in the field of languages in 2014, teaching English and Arabic to foreigners in my hometown of Cairo. Being raised in a bilingual environment, I developed an innate ability to both learn and teach languages.

After my arrival in Brazil, I continued my career as an Arabic and English teacher in several educational institutions. With the advancement of distance learning, especially during the pandemic period, I delved into this field and developed my own methodology for teaching the Arabic language.

Inspired by my passion for making learning more accessible and engaging, I decided to start my own school. In this endeavor, I have achieved exceptional results in teaching the Arabic language, despite being recognized as one of the most challenging languages in the world.

items.question: Does the course have a fixed schedule?

response.value: Classes are online via Zoom and are recorded, making them available to students, as well as all the material we will cover. If the student is unable to attend the live class, he will still be able to follow it through the recording.

items.question: Who guarantees that I will learn the language?

response.value: Our school has a quality structure and a highly capable methodology to guarantee your learning. Our methodology provides quick and easy learning, the student speaks from the first class. Its method is innovative with a focus on results and our system is recognized as one of the most efficient in learning.

items.question: What is the methodology used in the course?

response.value: With our methodology, after the literacy module, the student will learn to speak the language from the first class, with more modules focused on everyday situations. Our approach does not follow traditional methods; you will be trained to form your own sentences and participate in conversations during class. Guaranteed results in record time.

items.question: Do I need to be literate in Arabic to speak the language?

response.value: No, we have already achieved fluency with several students without them being literate, using phonetic transliteration. However, we strongly recommend literacy in Arabic, as this will allow the student to gain independence in the language and improve their knowledge.
- He has never had contact with an Arab in his life and is starting from scratch.
- You've already studied the language, but you forgot a lot of things or you don't feel safe to speak.
- Can communicate, but wants to gain more vocabulary and improve knowledge.
- Want to watch series, movies, read books and understand what is being said without difficulty.
- Increase the range of opportunities in the labor market.
- He wants to travel without going through the trouble because he doesn't know the language.
- If you want to do an exchange someday, you need to have a solid foundation in the language.
- Want to master Arabic in a simple and uncomplicated way.

items.question: What do I do if I have a question during the course?

response.value: Throughout your Arabic learning journey, you will have direct access to the teacher and our team. Feel free to send your questions, activities for correction and even pronunciation audios. We will be by your side, accompanying you, step by step and offering continuous support.

items.question: Does the course have a certificate?

response.value: Yes, the student will receive a certificate attesting to the completion of the modules, course load and all relevant information needed.

paragraphs.text: Sou professora de √°rabe h√° quase 10 anos. Comecei o meu trabalho no campo dos idiomas em 2014, lecionando ingl√™s e √°rabe para estrangeiros em minha cidade natal, Cairo. Por ser criada em um ambiente bil√≠ngue, desenvolvi uma habilidade inata tanto para aprender quanto para ensinar idiomas.

Ap√≥s minha chegada ao Brasil, continuei minha trajet√≥ria como professora de √°rabe e ingl√™s em diversas institui√ß√µes educacionais. Com o avan√ßo do ensino √† dist√¢ncia, principalmente durante o per√≠odo de pandemia, aprofundei-me nesse campo e desenvolvi minha pr√≥pria metodologia de ensino do idioma √°rabe.
